libRTX_CM0.a            Cortex-M0 little endian library
libRTX_CM0_B.a          Cortex-M0 big endian library

libRTX_CM3.a            Cortex-M3 little endian library
libRTX_CM3_B.a          Cortex-M3 big endian library

libRTX_CM4_B.a          Cortex-M4F hard FP abi big endian library

libRTX_CM4.a            Cortex-M4F hard FP abi little endian library
libRTX_CM4_HFP.a        Cortex-M4F hard FP abi little endian library (Silicon Labs make)
libRTX_CM4_SFP.a        Cortex-M4F softfp FP abi little endian library (Silicon Labs make)
